languages.text: "Увы, Ваша Светлость, мне неведомо, как отомкнуть замки на сем хранилище, не повредив его содержимое. Кто-то из прошлых Корабельных исповедников крепко запечатал реликварий, дабы оружие нельзя было забрать. Подозреваю, это крайняя мера предосторожности против воров и еретиков, что дерзнули бы посягнуть на святыню. Должен быть некий многомудрый способ отпереть реликварий, и знай я его, непременно бы поведал вам".

traits.locale_text: "Увы, Ваша Светлость, мне неведомо, как отомкнуть замки на сем хранилище, не повредив его содержимое. Кто-то из прошлых Корабельных исповедников крепко запечатал реликварий, дабы оружие нельзя было забрать. Подозреваю, это крайняя мера предосторожности против воров и еретиков, что дерзнули бы посягнуть на святыню. Должен быть некий многомудрый способ отпереть реликварий, и знай я его, непременно бы поведал вам".

languages.text: "Alas, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not know of a way to open the locks on that particular receptacle without damaging its contents. One of the ship's confessors from days past sealed the reliquary well so as to bar anyone from taking the weapon. I suppose it was a desperate precautionary measure against thieves and heretics who would seek to lay their hands on the holy relic. I am sure there exists some impenetrable secret method of unlocking the reliquary, and if I only knew what it is, I would tell you right this moment."

languages.text: «Por desgracia, mi{mf|lord|lady}, desconozco cómo abrir las cerraduras de ese receptáculo en concreto sin dañar su contenido. Antaño, uno de los confesores de la nave selló el relicario para que nadie pudiese apropiarse del arma. Supongo que fue una medida preventiva desesperada contra ladrones y herejes que pretendiesen poner sus sucias manos sobre una reliquia sagrada. Estoy seguro de que existe algún método secreto e impenetrable para desbloquear el cierre, y si supiese cuál es, se lo revelaría aquí y ahora».
languages.original_text: "Alas, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not know of a way to open the locks on that particular receptacle without damaging its contents. One of the ship's confessors from days past sealed the reliquary well so as to bar anyone from taking the weapon. I suppose it was a desperate precautionary measure against thieves and heretics who would seek to lay their hands on the holy relic. I am sure there exists some impenetrable secret method of unlocking the reliquary, and if I only knew what it is, I would tell you right this moment."

traits.locale_text: «Por desgracia, mi{mf|lord|lady}, desconozco cómo abrir las cerraduras de ese receptáculo en concreto sin dañar su contenido. Estoy seguro de que existe algún método secreto e impenetrable para desbloquear el cierre, y si supiese cuál es, se lo revelaría aquí y ahora».

languages.text: 「残念ですが、その容器の中身を壊さずに鍵を開ける方法を私は知りません。昔、この船の懺悔者の一人が、武器が誰にも奪われないよう聖骨箱を厳重に封印したのです。聖遺物を盗もうとする泥棒や異端者に対する抵抗だったのだと思います。聖骨箱を開ける秘密の方法があるのだと思います。その方法さえ知っていたら、今すぐにでもあなたに教えたのに」
languages.original_text: "Alas, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not know of a way to open the locks on that particular receptacle without damaging its contents. One of the ship's confessors from days past sealed the reliquary well so as to bar anyone from taking the weapon. I suppose it was a desperate precautionary measure against thieves and heretics who would seek to lay their hands on the holy relic. I am sure there exists some impenetrable secret method of unlocking the reliquary, and if I only knew what it is, I would tell you right this moment."

traits.locale_text: 「残念ですが、その容器の中身を壊さずに鍵を開ける方法を私は知りません。昔、この船の懺悔者の一人が、武器が誰にも奪われないよう聖骨箱を厳重に封印したのです。聖遺物を盗もうとする泥棒や異端者に対する抵抗だったのだと思います。聖骨箱を開ける秘密の方法があるのだと思います。その方法さえ知っていたら、今すぐにでもあなたに教えたのに」

languages.text: “很遗憾，大人，如果强行破解这个机关的锁扣，里面的东西恐怕也会损坏。前任告解神父把这个圣骨匣完好地密封起来，以防可能会有其他人拿走武器。我猜，这可能是某种非常极端的措施，用来防止窃贼或异端分子染指圣物。我相信，肯定会有某种不为人知的方法能打开这个圣骨匣。要是我知道该怎么打开这个盒子就好了，那我肯定会立刻告知您。”
languages.original_text: "Alas, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not know of a way to open the locks on that particular receptacle without damaging its contents. One of the ship's confessors from days past sealed the reliquary well so as to bar anyone from taking the weapon. I suppose it was a desperate precautionary measure against thieves and heretics who would seek to lay their hands on the holy relic. I am sure there exists some impenetrable secret method of unlocking the reliquary, and if I only knew what it is, I would tell you right this moment."

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，大人，如果强行破解这个机关的锁扣，里面的东西恐怕也会损坏。前任告解神父把这个圣骨匣完好地密封起来，以防可能会有其他人拿走武器。我猜，这可能是某种非常极端的措施，用来防止窃贼或异端分子染指圣物。我相信，肯定会有某种不为人知的方法能打开这个圣骨匣。要是我知道该怎么打开这个盒子就好了，那我肯定会立刻告知您。”

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich kenne leider keinen Weg, um die Schlösser dieses Behältnisses zu öffnen, ohne seinen Inhalt zu beschädigen. Einer der Konfessoren des Schiffs hat das Reliquiar seinerzeit versiegelt, auf dass niemand die Waffe führen möge. Ich nehme an, das war eine verzweifelte Vorsichtsmaßnahme gegen Diebe und Ketzer, die das heilige Relikt an sich bringen wollten. Es gibt gewiss eine verlässliche zweite Methode, das Reliquiar zu öffnen, und wenn ich sie wüsste, würde ich sie Euch augenblicklich verraten."
languages.original_text: "Alas, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not know of a way to open the locks on that particular receptacle without damaging its contents. One of the ship's confessors from days past sealed the reliquary well so as to bar anyone from taking the weapon. I suppose it was a desperate precautionary measure against thieves and heretics who would seek to lay their hands on the holy relic. I am sure there exists some impenetrable secret method of unlocking the reliquary, and if I only knew what it is, I would tell you right this moment."

Einer der Konfessoren des Schiffs hat das Reliquiar seinerzeit versiegelt, auf dass niemand die Waffe führen möge. Ich nehme an, das war eine verzweifelte Vorsichtsmaßnahme gegen Diebe und Ketzer, die das heilige Relikt an sich bringen wollten. Es gibt gewiss eine verlässliche zweite Methode, das Reliquiar zu öffnen, und wenn ich sie wüsste, würde ich sie Euch augenblicklich verraten."

languages.text: « Hélas, Votre Seigneurie, j'ignore comment débloquer les verrous de ce précieux réceptacle sans en abîmer le contenu. Un confesseur des temps passés a scellé le reliquaire hermétiquement afin d'éviter que l'arme ne tombe entre de mauvaises mains. Sans doute une mesure désespérée pour faire barrage à la convoitise des voleurs et des hérétiques qui chercheraient à s'emparer de cette sainte relique. Il existe très probablement une méthode secrète permettant de l'ouvrir, et si je la connaissais, croyez bien que je vous la divulguerais séance tenante. »
languages.original_text: "Alas, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not know of a way to open the locks on that particular receptacle without damaging its contents. One of the ship's confessors from days past sealed the reliquary well so as to bar anyone from taking the weapon. I suppose it was a desperate precautionary measure against thieves and heretics who would seek to lay their hands on the holy relic. I am sure there exists some impenetrable secret method of unlocking the reliquary, and if I only knew what it is, I would tell you right this moment."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, ne yazık ki bu spesifik haznenin kilidini, içeriklerine hasar vermeden açmanın bir yolunu bilmiyorum. Geminin geçmişteki günah çıkarıcılarından biri, istisnasız kimse silahı alamasın diye kutsal emanet odasını çok iyi bir şekilde mühürlemiş. Kutsal emanete el uzatmaya çalışan hırsızlara ve kâfirlere karşı ihtiyati bir önlem olduğunu tahmin ediyorum. Kutsal emanet odasını açmanın gizli ve kesin bir yönteminin var olduğundan eminim ve bunun ne olduğunu bilseydim inanın size anında iletirdim."
languages.original_text: "Alas, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I do not know of a way to open the locks on that particular receptacle without damaging its contents. One of the ship's confessors from days past sealed the reliquary well so as to bar anyone from taking the weapon. I suppose it was a desperate precautionary measure against thieves and heretics who would seek to lay their hands on the holy relic. I am sure there exists some impenetrable secret method of unlocking the reliquary, and if I only knew what it is, I would tell you right this moment."
